articles.content:

articles.title: Coronavirus: Two deaths from Japan cruise ship, media report
articles.description: The pair, in their 80s, were taken off the Diamond Princess after contracting Covid-19.
articles.content:

 At least 621 people on the ship are infected
Two passengers from a cruise ship quarantined in Japan, have died after contracting the Covid-19 virus.

articles.title: Wolves: Where next for Nuno Espirito Santo's side after rapid rise?
articles.description: As Wolves prepare for their Europa League last-32 tie, BBC Sport's Simon Stone looks at how a club that languished in League One six years ago are now hoping to continue their rise.
articles.content:
Under Wolves manager Nuno Espirito Santo's (left) leadership the club won promotion and then qualified for Europe
It is less than six years since Wolves went to Crawley Town for a midweek League One game.

articles.title: Qantas warns coronavirus impact of as much as $99m
articles.description: The warning comes as concerns grow over the impact of the outbreak on airlines and the global economy.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
Qantas has warned of severe financial impact as the potentially deadly coronavirus dampens demand for travel in Asia.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Walking through Beijing's near empty streets
